languages.text: "Увести добычу прямо под носом убийц, не разводя панику среди экипажа — мудрый ход".
"It was a wise move to deny the assassins their target without starting a panic among the crew."
languages.original_text: "Увести добычу прямо под носом убийц, не разводя панику среди экипажа — мудрый ход".

traits.locale_text: "It was a wise move to deny the assassins their target without starting panic among the crew."

languages.text: «Ha sido una decisión sabia denegar su objetivo a los asesinos sin despertar el pánico entre la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "It was a wise move to deny the assassins their target without starting a panic among the crew."

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido una decisión sabia denegar su objetivo a los asesinos sin despertar el pánico entre la tripulación».

languages.text: 「乗組員にパニックを起こさせることなく、暗殺者の標的を断ったのは賢明な判断でした」
languages.original_text: "It was a wise move to deny the assassins their target without starting a panic among the crew."

traits.locale_text: 「乗組員にパニックを起こさせることなく、暗殺者の標的を断ったのは賢明な判断でした」

languages.text: “这是个明智的举动，既阻止了那些刺客，又没有引起船员的恐慌。”
languages.original_text: "It was a wise move to deny the assassins their target without starting a panic among the crew."

traits.locale_text: “这是个明智的举动，既阻止了那些刺客，又没有引起船员的恐慌。”

languages.text: "Es war klug, den Assassinen ihr Ziel zu verwehren, ohne eine Panik in der Crew auszulösen."
languages.original_text: "It was a wise move to deny the assassins their target without starting a panic among the crew."

traits.locale_text: "Es war klug, den Assassinen ihr Ziel zu verwehren, ohne eine Panik in der Crew auszulösen."

languages.text: « C'était judicieux de votre part de priver les assassins de leur cible sans pour autant déclencher un mouvement de panique au sein de l'équipage. »
languages.original_text: "It was a wise move to deny the assassins their target without starting a panic among the crew."

traits.locale_text: « C'était judicieux de votre part de priver les assassins de leur cible sans pour autant déclencher un mouvement de panique au sein de l'équipage. »

languages.text: "Mürettebatta paniğe yol açmadan suikastçıları hedeflerinden mahrum bırakmak akıllıca bir hareketti."
languages.original_text: "It was a wise move to deny the assassins their target without starting a panic among the crew."
